snippet: GLICKENHAUS--Seth. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Seth Glickenhaus. Seth cared deeply for those in need and his legacy of kindness, leadership, and devotion to strengthening Jewish community will live on in the loving family he leaves behind. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Seth's beloved wife, Sarah; his children, Nancy and James (Meg); his grandchildren and great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: GLICKENHAUS--Seth. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Seth Glickenhaus. Seth cared deeply for those in need and his legacy of kindness, leadership, and devotion to strengthening Jewish community will live on in the loving family he leaves behind. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Seth's beloved wife, Sarah; his children, Nancy and James (Meg); his grandchildren and great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
